cluster_relations.rel_desc: Butterflies transfer pollen as they move between flowers.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject actively moves or carries the object (a material or entity) from one location or entity to another.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Pollen is moved between flowers during pollination.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject material is transported or moved between instances of the object entity category, typically by some agent.

args.justification: Normalize the predicate by removing the embedded spatial preposition 'between' from the canonical_rel_name. The spatial aspect is already captured in the SpatialQualifier ('between flowers'), so the canonical predicate should stay general ('is_transferred') while qualifiers handle specific geometry. This also keeps the transfer predicates across the KG lexically consistent.
args.remark: Spatial detail 'between flowers' is intentionally modeled as a qualifier rather than part of the canonical predicate.
